Reviews.Title: Great Phone at Great Price......with 3G/HSDPA for AT&T; too.

Reviews.Content: Wanted to try something new and came across the X8a. I have had many, many, many phones in the last few years......very much a tech and cell phone junkie. I love android and wanted something that is not the norm amid the sea of iphones and large 4.3in screens. This fits the bill. Reviews.Title: All is well until a glitch overseas!
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I had to buy this in a hurry as I had taken an instant decision to buy it before I left US for good.Major PRO's: The package was delivered real fast considering I ordered via standard shipping (Thanks to Amazon for that!). It was a gift for my wife and she absolutely loves it! Touch-screen is highly receptive and the orientation change from Potrait to Landscape occurs in a jiffy. Battery life is top-notch and the unit looks really cool. It fits well in a palm and the texture doesnt make way for a slip. These are all the major CON's that my wife figured.Major CON's: It was supposed to be an International version but I found a few glitches using it overseas. Once the unit loses its coverage area (say network) inside a lift or so..communication network doesnt come back on its own so it has to be re-started to make it operational. Hence I termed this as a 'glitch' and not a 'problem', though it causes utter dis-satisfaction. Another concern was the Wi-Fi, not strong enough in detecting available networks...again using overseas. I didnt experience any such faults/issue when it was used for a short period of time in the US.Overall...Pretty Good!! I would rather give a 3.5* but Amazon doesnt allow me ;-) so I'll give a 4*!

Reviews.Title: My last sony ericsson phone
Reviews.Author: Bugzee
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone early in the year and only a few months later have difficulty using it. It shuts off without warning even when charged.I cannot get MMS text messages and tried downloading the upgrade to receive them however it was not successful.I have difficulty syncing it to some of the bluetooth features in my car (which I had no problem doing with earlier sony ericsson phones)in particular the audible text message featureI have been loyal to this brand for about 8 years but this will be my last sony ericsson phone.I purchased the phone for its compact size however not being able to use it because it continually shuts off renders it useless.I hope I have better luck with my next phone.
